name: Music Note tap tap - endless switch
name_original: Music Note tap tap - endless switch
description:
Play the #1 piano rhythm game for FREE!
Brand-new game play provide your fingers a quick paced thrill using the elegance of piano playing!
Share your piano performance together with your family members

- How You Can Play:
Gameplay is simple and addictive: just try to match arrows on note with same direction button.
Tap on the right button when you see note sign with right arrow inside or tap button with left arrow when you see note with left arrow.

Give it a try, benefit from the piano music, train your fingers, eyes, multitasking and brain to become faster, and try to beat your buddies!

Play beautiful music just like a professional pianist!

I love to listen to your feedback.
If you like this app, a positive rating or review would be a great support for me.
Just Write me in review or fb or e-mail which song do you want to get in next update I'll try my best.

Thank you very much!
